title: Telegram Bot Interface Mockup
prompt: Create a Telegram chat interface mockup showing trading bot messages. Phone frame with dark Telegram theme. Show conversation with 'SURGE-WSI Bot'. Messages include: Trade alert card with GBPUSD BUY signal (green header, entry/SL/TP levels, quality score badge), Status update showing 'Position Opened', P&L notification showing '+45 pips / +$135', Daily summary card with win rate and total P&L. Include bot command buttons at bottom: '/status', '/positions', '/report', '/pause'. Show both bot messages (left-aligned) and user commands (right-aligned, blue bubbles). Add SURGE-WSI bot avatar icon. Include timestamp on messages. Realistic Telegram mobile app aesthetic.
negative_prompt: unrealistic UI, wrong Telegram styling, cluttered messages, hard to read text
